ygData.subject: Re: Watchman Drexlin quest...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have spoken to Drexlin and recived the Quest.  He says he was sent to the Karanas to Kill some undead Brownies, and return their remains to Akannon. He gives
ygData.messageBody:
I have spoken to Drexlin and recived the Quest. He says he was sent to the
Karanas to Kill some undead Brownies, and return their remains to Akannon.
He gives you a 4 slot Box which is No Drop i belive. Last i heard this
quest was broken because the Tiny skelitens you recive when you kill the
undead brownies are NO DROP, so getting 4 of them and filling the box is
not possible. He also says he is in a hurry and gives you a deadline for
returning the full box to him. I dont think anyone is killing him when he
spawns , just that he is rare and only spawns a certain times and then goes
away again. hope this helps.

Rexus Maximus, Veeshan.


At 10:20 AM 12/29/99 +1300, you wrote:
>From: jbuckingham@...
>
>Watchman Drexlin - this is a new quest, where one of the guys the
>Gemchoppers hall who previously never said anything now directs you to find
>Watchman Drexlin near Qeynos. According to Allakhazam's site, he spawns
>near/on the stone bridge between north and south karana, on the north
>Karana side and gives you a quest to kill Tiny Skeletons. I've never been
>able to find him, probably due ot the sheer number of powergaming weenies
>that are KoS to gemchoppers from killing gnome guards, so he probably
>doesnt last too long once he pops. Has anyone managed to complete this
>quest yet? Is he always there unless someone kills him, or does he only
>spawn at certain times of the day... I'm hoping the later, cos it really
>bugs me when people kill quest creatures - I still remember when I was
>young and I could only do the report quests after a server reboot, becasue
>the guard killers would often kill Joogl Doobraugh as well, and he has a
>really long spawn time..
>
>>
